channel.title: Dark Bow Help Please?
channel.description:
i tried searching, but i can't find anything... can anyone link me to a tut to get dark bow working, double, or single shot, it doesn't matter. at this point, i just need it to shoot some thing.. like, what do i add where, to set an arrow for it, and what arrow do i use, and where do i add the coding for the bow.. help is much appreciated,
-Liam
